item.title: 'No hire' job market leaves unemployed in limbo as threats to economy multiply
item.description: The unemployment rate is low and the economy is still growing, but those out of work face the slowest pace of hiring in more than a decade

item.title: Honda's profit slips as President Trump's tariffs take their toll
item.description: Honda has reported a 37% drop in profit for the first fiscal half through September
